Uses of Class
lobby.chat.ChatController

  • Packages that use ChatController 
    Package Description
    lobby.menu
    Contains all files concerning the menu area of the game lobby.
    network.client
    Contains all files concerning clients.
    network.server
    Contains all files concerning servers.

    • Uses of ChatController in lobby.menu

      Methods in lobby.menu with parameters of type ChatController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MenuController.setChatController(ChatController chatController)
      Sets the ChatController used by this controller's client and Server to display messages.

    • Uses of ChatController in network.client

      Methods in network.client that return ChatController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ChatController ClientController.getChatController()
      Getter for the ChatController, that is used to display messages in the chat.
      Methods in network.client with parameters of type ChatController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ClientController.setChatController(ChatController chatController)
      Sets the ChatController which is used to display chat messages.
      Constructors in network.client with parameters of type ChatController 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientController(ClientConnection client, ChatController chatController, Lobby lobby, ApplicationController applicationController)
      Creates a new ClientController.

    • Uses of ChatController in network.server

      Methods in network.server that return ChatController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ChatController ServerController.getChatController()
      Returns the ChatController which is being used to display messages.
      Constructors in network.server with parameters of type ChatController 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerController(ChatController chatController, Lobby lobby, Server server)
      Creates a new server controller.
